ServiceInfoResponseCoverage.name: ServiceInfoResponseCoverage
ServiceInfoResponseCoverage.description: Represents coverage details about a service information response. For example, if additional information or documentation is required for the coverage to be provided.

AssertionDate.description: The date on which the coverge assertion was made.

CoverageAssertionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the coverage assertion.

CoverageIndicator.description: Specifies if the requested service is covered under the insurance plan.

CoveragePlanTypeId.description: Specifies the type of plan the coverage assertion falls under.

DocRequiredReason.description: Specifies why the additional documentation is required for coverage to be provided.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

MemberPlanId.description: The member plan associated with the service information response coverage.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

PreapprovalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the preapproval, if satisfied.

PreapprovalRequirementInd.description: Specifies if preapproval is required for coverage to be provided.

ReferenceUrl.description: The URL of the reference used for determining the coverage information.

RequiredAddlInfoType.description: Specifies the type of additional information required for coverage to be provided. For example, the performer and location of the service.

RequiredDocumentationType.description: Specifies the type of additional documentation required for coverage to be provided.
